sentences.en: Adolescent suicide is rarely an impulsive reaction to immediate distress.
sentences.cn: 青少年自杀很少是由于突然发生不幸而作出的冲动反应。

sentences.en: After the scandal was exposed, Dr Bailey committed suicide.
sentences.cn: 丑闻曝光后，贝利博士自杀了。

sentences.en: He apparently left a suicide note (= letter explaining his reasons for killing himself ) on his desk.
sentences.cn: 他显然在桌上留了封绝笔信。

sentences.en: He brooded on whether she should commIt'suicide.
sentences.cn: 他想她是不是死于自杀.

sentences.en: I was grieved to hear of the suicide of James.
sentences.cn: 听到詹姆斯自杀的消息，我非常伤心。

sentences.en: It will not be suicide to admit your mistake.
sentences.cn: 承认你的错误并不等于自毁前程.

sentences.en: It's the story of a lovelorn girl whose suicide provokes bitter recriminations.
sentences.cn: 那是个关于一名失恋的姑娘的故事,她的自杀引起了严厉的互相指责.

sentences.en: More people commit suicide at Christmas than at any other time.
sentences.cn: 圣诞节期间自杀的人比其他任何时候都多。

sentences.en: More than once, depression drove him to attempt suicide.
sentences.cn: 抑郁症使他不止一次地企图自杀。

sentences.en: My mother attempted suicide on many occasions.
Police refused to say if the couple died in a suicide pact.
sentences.cn: 警察拒绝回答这对夫妇是否是一起自杀的。

sentences.en: Some people unluckily achieve suicide when they only meant to attempt it.
sentences.cn: 一些人只是想尝试一下自杀，但却不幸真的身亡了。

sentences.en: The inquest will bring in a verdict of suicide.
sentences.cn: 这次审讯将得出自杀的结论。

sentences.en: The number of suicide has increased.
sentences.cn: 自杀案件的数量增加了.

sentences.en: To do that would be nothing short of suicide.
You write very movingly of your sister Amy's suicide.
sentences.cn: 你对你妹妹埃米的自杀描写很是让人伤感。

words.tran_cn: 自杀的，自杀性的；自我毁灭的；自取灭亡的
